SELECT t.TRADE_ID AS tradeId, t.TRADE_NO AS tradeNo, DATE_FORMAT(t.TRADE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS tradeDate, t.LIKE, DATE_FORMAT(t.LIKE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS likeDate, p.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, q.SELLER_NAME AS sellerName FROM basis_tb_trade t, basis_tb_item p, basis_tb_seller q WHERE t.ITEM_ID = p.ITEM_ID AND p.SELLER_ID = q.SELLER_ID
ORDER BY TRADE_ID desc
ORDER BY $sort$ $order$
LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $offset$

t.trade_no = #tradeNo#
t.trade_date = null
t.trade_date = STR_TO_DATE( #tradeDate#, '%Y-%m-%d')
, t.like = #like# , t.like_date = NOW()
WHERE t.trade_id = #tradeId#
WHERE t.trade_code = #tradeCode#
AND t.like is null
